messages.message: Hi Priya! :) Got your request, happy to connect. Your profile caught my eye — pediatrician with a love for cooking & classical music... super rare combo tbh 😄
Haha thank u Rajesh! Honestly your headline made me smile... 'software engineer with traditional values' is kinda wholesome 😅
😂 Yeah, bit old-school I guess. Blame it on my mom’s sanskar overload 😅. So how's work at Apollo? Must be hectic with lil ones?
Hectic is an understatement lol. 12hr shifts and surprise tantrums daily 🥲 but honestly I love it. Kids are brutally honest but also adorable.
Haha sounds like a mix of joy & chaos! I'm in Bangalore rn — remote mostly, so flexible hours. Used to the chaos too tho — lived in IIT Delhi hostel for 4 yrs 😵‍💫
Oh wow IITD 👏👏 smart & sorted huh? What kinda stuff do you work on?
Haha not always sorted, trust me 😅. I work as Sr. Engineer at Tech Mahindra — mostly backend systems + some cloud infra (AWS certified squad 🚀)
Cloud things go over my head tbh 😅 but backend sounds v important. Also cool that you're in Bangalore! I love that city. Was there last year for a CMEs conference.
Next time you're here lemme treat you to some filter coffee ☕ + Dosa trail at VV Puram 😄
Haha deal! I’m a sucker for South Indian food 😍 esp crispy ghee roast 😋 btw are you a full veg too? Just curious
Yesss pure veg 🚫🍗. Born and raised that way, never tempted to switch. You?
Same 🙌 been veg all my life. And I cook a lot too – sometimes do mini experiments with Gujarati fusion. Made khichdi sushi once 😅
Khichdi sushi?? That's peak desi innovation 😂 plz open a food truck, I'd be your first investor. Also... tell me you're into cricket too and not just music 😏
Lmaoo I *am* into cricket but I support RCB so... emotional damage 🥲🥲
RCB fan? Ok now it's destiny 😂 Bangalore+Veg+Cricket = good signs from the universe 🌌
Haha true dat! On a serious note — I liked how your profile mentioned respecting both traditions and modernity. That balance is so rare these days.
Thanks 🙏 I really believe both can coexist. Like... I wanna support my partner’s career just like I saw my dad support my mom all her life. What about you — what do you look for?
That's beautiful 🧡 For me, honesty + emotional maturity matter most. Someone who doesn't feel threatened by an ambitious woman, y’know?
100% agree. A real partner lifts you up, not compete. Also... I don’t see ambition as a threat. It’s inspiring 💪
Glad to hear that 😊 Btw, random q — do you like pets? I have two cats, they're basically my kids 🐱🐱
I LOVE pets!! Grew up with a labrador named Simba 🐶 Total softie. If we ever meet, your cats might mistake me for a live scratching post 😅
Hahaha Simba sounds adorable! Okay this convo made me laugh a lot. Thank you 🙏
Same here Priya. I feel we got some really good vibes going 🙂 Hope we keep chatting and see where this goes
